articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.title: A hot pink Barbie flip phone, Xiaomi 14 Ultra with Leica camera grab attention at Europe’s biggest tech show - The Indian Express
articles.description: HMD Global’s Barbie flip phone was the star of the show, but the Xiaomi 14 Ultra and its new camera system also grabbed attention at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona.
articles.content: Soon, a Barbie flip phone will make its way to the market, courtesy of HMD, short for Human Mobile Devices, and toy maker Mattel. During the Mobile World Congress on Sunday, HMD Global and Mattel ann… [+4421 chars]
